title: "WE ARE iNFiNiTY" - Behind the Song - CPR
description: CPR tells the story behind writing the song "WE ARE iNFiNiTY" off of his latest mixtape "Dream State 2: Finding Flow State." It all started with an extremely vivid dream he had that made him start to realize that we as humans are not all we think we are...
